    • Constructor Detail

      • DigiCertOneSigningService

        public DigiCertOneSigningService(String apiKey,
                                 File keystore,
                                 String storepass)
        Creates a new DigiCert ONE signing service.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - the DigiCert ONE API access token
        keystore - the keystore holding the client certificate to authenticate with the server
        storepass - the password of the keystore

      • DigiCertOneSigningService

        public DigiCertOneSigningService(String apiKey,
                                 X509KeyManager keyManager)
        Creates a new DigiCert ONE signing service.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - the DigiCert ONE API access token
        keyManager - the key manager to authenticate the client with the server
